name: Retro Pinball
description: "Retro Pinball " is a collection of seven pinball tables based on the great machines of the 1990s!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Shader Model 3+ nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
